message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

This paper is about visual tracking, which is a topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of the 3D discrete cosine transform (3D-DCT) for constructing an appearance model is a technique that falls under machine learning (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the use of a similarity measure, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper proposes an incremental algorithm for updating the object representation, which is a technique commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
